TextView.android:text: To save lives by making emergency response accessible to everyone through voice-activated, blockchain-powered technology that works anywhere, anytime. Anyone can be a Hero.

Solana SOS is a voice-activated emergency response app that provides instant life-saving guidance. When you say 'Hey SOS, drowning help!' the app immediately provides step-by-step CPR instructions while automatically calling 911 and sharing your location.

**Key Features:**
• Voice-activated emergency response
• Automatic 911 calling and location sharing
• Life-saving instructions for 12+ emergency types
• Works offline without internet connection
• Blockchain-secured emergency logs
• Gamification for skill development

Tap for detailed information →

**1. Voice Activation:** Say 'Hey SOS' followed by the emergency type
**2. Instant Response:** App recognizes emergency and provides immediate guidance
**3. Automatic Actions:** App calls 911 and shares location automatically
**4. Life-Saving Instructions:** Step-by-step guidance for the specific emergency
**5. Smart Integration:** 911 operator stays on standby for when you're ready
**6. Blockchain Logging:** Emergency response is securely recorded on Solana

**ACTIVATION:** Say 'Hey SOS' or press Emergency button
**EMERGENCY TYPES:** Drowning, Heart Attack, Choking, Bleeding, Stroke, Seizure, Poisoning, Burn, Diabetic, Allergic, Trauma, Unconscious
**RESPONSE:** App provides step-by-step life-saving instructions
**LOCATION:** Automatically shares your location with emergency services
**RECORDING:** Audio recorded for emergency responders
**BLOCKCHAIN:** Emergency response logged on Solana for transparency

**Current Offline Database (12 Types):**
• Drowning, Heart Attack, Choking, Bleeding, Stroke
• Seizure, Poisoning, Burn, Diabetic, Allergic
• Trauma, Unconscious

**Database Expansion:** Additional life-threatening emergency types are planned to be added regularly to the offline database through app updates. This ensures offline users have access to more emergency protocols without requiring internet connectivity.

**Context-Aware:** Each emergency type includes step-by-step life-saving instructions that work without internet connectivity.

**AI-Powered Unlimited Types:** When hybrid online/offline mode is active, the app provides unlimited emergency types with enhanced AI-powered guidance. The AI can handle any emergency scenario without database limitations.

**Enhanced Features:**
• Smart 911 operator integration
• Real-time context analysis
• Advanced voice recognition
• Cloud-based emergency protocols
• Enhanced location and contact services
• Dynamic emergency response adaptation

**Life-Saving Guidance Sources:**
• American Heart Association (AHA) - CPR guidelines
• American Red Cross - Emergency response protocols
• Centers for Disease Control (CDC) - Medical guidelines
• World Health Organization (WHO) - International standards
• National Institutes of Health (NIH) - Medical research
• Emergency Medical Services (EMS) - Professional protocols

**Protocol Verification:** All emergency response instructions are verified against current medical standards and regularly updated to reflect the latest best practices from these authoritative sources.

• Voice data processed locally on your device
• Location shared only during emergencies
• No personal data stored in the cloud
• Blockchain logs contain only emergency metadata
• End-to-end encryption for all communications

**Security Features:**
• Secure voice recognition
• Encrypted emergency logs on Solana blockchain
• Anonymous emergency reporting
• No tracking or profiling
